name: TheDefender , free sourcecode for gamemaker
description:
Hello, developpers,

I stopped this project a long time ago and realised i may not finish it. I donot want it to go to waste so i wanted to share the code for free. The truth is i am not good as a level designer so i stopped the game. 

This code/game may be usefull only if you use gamemaker.

You can learn to :

  • Build Things - gui and process
  • How to throw things (arrows and such) to mobs (tower ai)
  • How to manage tower (upgrade, direction and more)
  • How to create a state machine
  • How to use timeline to generate randomized combat (wave of monster)
  • How to save score per level and give gems for better score
  • How to read json file to make databases (eg : monsters, skills)
  • How to read/save a game
  • How to manager building and magic management through upgrade, only two object required to do this (2 for tower tek and 2 for magic tek) and saving the whole thing
  • How to implement help in your game
  • Tower ai : detection of mob in an area sub circle, circle, rectangle, square,etc
  • How to use a world map

...and many other things, run the demo ! Plz go to the magic and forge and get stuffs before going to battle. To use magic you have to assign spells with 1/2/3 

If you want more explanations you can try to contact me below or at https://forum.yoyogames.com (my member name is fabseven)

Hope you can learn something - you can donate if you are really happy.

Bye !
